me thaththwaya awama kirima sandaha adhyapana amathyanshaya, palath amathyansha ha usas adhyapana amathyanshaya ekwa wadapiliwelak da aarambha kara thibe.ee anuwa usas thakshana aayathanawala kala ha wanija wishayayan hadarana sisun widya ha injineru wishayayanta yomu kirime wadapiliwelak usas adhyapana amathyanshaya aarambha kara atha.me wana wita widya usas pela wishaya nomathi pasal sahitha pradeshiya lekam kottasa 72 k merata thibena athara widya wishaya iganwena ek pasalak ho athi pradeshiya lekam kottasa 100 k athi bawath disanayaka mahatha sandahan karayi.me thaththwaya wenas kirima sandaha kadinam wadapiliwelak adhyapana amathyanshaye meheyawima mathada kriyathmaka karayi.
